---
title: "Useful tools"
---

Here we list software packages for prior elicitation, specification and diagnostics.

- [makemyprior](https://github.com/ingebogh/makemyprior): R package for construction and visualizing priors
- [preliz](https://preliz.readthedocs.io/en/latest/): Python package for prior elicitation
- [priorsense](https://n-kall.github.io/priorsense/index.html): R package for diagnosing influence of priors
- [arviz.psens](https://python.arviz.org/en/latest/api/generated/arviz.psens.html): Python function for diagnosing influence of priors
- [RBesT](https://opensource.nibr.com/RBesT/index.html): R package including functions for deriving priors from historical data
